Click on the bed.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath.synopsis: This camp relationship dialog happens after OM between Astarion and Blood Merchant is done (next night in the camp).Different reactions from Astarion depending on the player choices during the OM.

Romance1_SD_Invitation.synopsis: After flirting with you in his InParty, this camp night triggers where Astarion suggests you sleep together. If you agree to sleep with him, his Act 1 romance night (CAMP_GoblinHuntCelebration_SD_ROM_NightWithAstarion) will trigger.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_62.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_62.text: I can't believe you let me do that. Killing all those people.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_120.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_120.text: I wanted what was best for you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_262.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_262.text: You sweet, sweet thing. I want what's best for you too, of course.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_255.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_255.text: I wasn't about to release seven thousand hungry vampire spawn into the world.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_257.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_257.text: Of course, whatever you need to tell yourself, darling.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_45.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_45.text: But make no mistake, I will forever remember what you did for me today.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_197.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_197.text: And one wicked turn deserves another.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_89.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_89.text: So, tell me what you desire. What can I do for my dearest pet?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_217.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_217.text: I want to be a vampire, like you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_190.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_190.text: I want you. I want your body.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_160.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_160.text: You can tell me that you've learned something from all this.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_46.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_46.text: Oh don't be such a humourless little wretch - it's nothing but a joke.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_248.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_248.text: It doesn't feel like a joke. It feels like you mean it.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_203.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_203.text: Life's a joke, dear, but now we're the ones laughing.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_52.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_52.text: You haven't learned anything, have you?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_163.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_163.text: Truly? And what was I supposed to learn from this?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_229.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_229.text: I hoped you'd learn to love me.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_121.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_121.text: Who's to say I don't? I'm willing to share all of this with you. What's that if not love?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_269.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_269.text: Of course if that's not enough - if you need something more - perhaps this isn't for you?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_92.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_92.text: Don't you ever compare me to him! Never!

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_108.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_108.text: How dare you stand there and judge me. As you know the first thing.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_142.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_142.text: That sex and relationships aren't about power over someone else.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_97.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_97.text: Please, everything is about power. Sex, relationships, violence - they're all just different forms of control.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_61.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_61.text: And now you think you can stand there and tell me how to feel? Because - what? Because you care?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_60.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_60.text: Your hands are bloody as mine, darling. Why would you go along with any of this just to pretend you're innocent now?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_134.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_134.text: I wanted you to feel safe.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_57.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_57.text: Because I cared! But maybe now I see how wrong I was.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_140.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_140.text: I did it for you, you piece of shit.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_240.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_240.text: All right. But if your offer is still open, I want to be a vampire. Just like you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_158.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_158.text: Oh my sweet, there are no vampires like me. And there never will be again.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_174.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_174.text: But if you want the gift of eternity, I can certainly offer you that. One little bite is all it would take.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_3.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_3.text: It would mean your salvation. Your eternity, despite that thing inside you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_50.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_50.text: That's what you want, isn't it? To be mine? Forever?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_149.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_149.text: Would you be able to bite me without getting hurt?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_127.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_127.text: Karlach, my love. I'm the Vampire Ascendant - there's nothing I can't do.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_127.context: NodeContext: Hubris. If he does bite her, he's going to die.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_71.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_71.text: So what would I be? A vampire? Or your spawn?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_151.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_151.text: You wouldn't just be some spawn - you're far more than that to me.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_109.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_109.text: My dark consort. My right hand. My most beloved spawn.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_49.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_49.text: Then it's everything you shall recieve.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_105.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_105.text: I will miss this warm flesh, mind you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_247.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_247.text: Spawn? I want to be a true vampire.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_37.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_37.text: And you will! All in good time.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_82.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_82.text: But we mustn't rush these things. You may need time to adjust.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_21.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_21.text: A beloved slave is still a slave.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_239.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_239.text: Oh don't be like that, I'd never want to control you. I love you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_235.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_235.text: After everything you went through with Cazador, you're going to make me a spawn?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_204.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_204.text: Oh that was completely different, I'd never hurt you. I love you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_23.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_23.text: That's what you've been waiting to hear, isn't it? That's what you want?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_177.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_177.text: We could be together for eternity, ruling this world side by side. We could have it all.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_189.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_189.text: I'm not sure. I'm burning so hot. I'm afraid of what will happen to you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_224.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_224.text: You haven't seen my power, darling. You don't know the things I can do.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_107.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_107.text: I am indomitable, Karlach. Nothing can stop me - least of all your hot-blooded self.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_186.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_186.text: I'm ready. Bite me. Make me yours. Fix me.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_41.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_41.text: I have been waiting so long for you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_106.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_106.text: Shall we have one last night together before you join me in immortality? One for the road, so to speak.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_32.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_32.text: We shall not. I just need you to bite me.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_233.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_233.text: Impatient are we? Well who am I to deny you?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_55.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_55.text: Huh. I forgot I'd be cold to the touch once I changed...

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_85.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_85.text: Not having second thoughts, are we?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_112.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_112.text: Then come with me, my love, and live your final night.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leads Tav away to a secluded place. You both undress and Astarion pushes Tav to the bed. The sex is wild and animalistic. (Note: While the sex isn't super explicit, it's important to show suggestions of movements...such as thrusting, action/reactions of ecstasy, etc.)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_171.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black and fade in as Astarion takes TAV into another section of the camp/a quiet secluded place. You are naked and vulnerable before him.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_64.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_64.text: Be careful, Astarion. My engine is running so hot. I won't be able to control it.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_211.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_211.text: Hush love, it's all right. You don't have to worry.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_244.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_244.text: Forget about your engine. Forget about control. I'll take care of everything.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_244.context: NodeContext: trying to reassure Karlach, while thinking of how he's going to have control of her soon

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_14.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_14.text: Explore his mind - see what he really thinks about you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_148.speaker: Narrator
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_148.text: *He will always see you as degrading yourself if you continue to be with him.*

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_238.speaker: Narrator
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_238.text: *But perhaps you wish to degrade yourself. And he knows it.*

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_281.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_281.text: You're missing the chance of a lifetime. You will never have another like me.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_281.context: NodeContext: Ego shattering a little bit

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_113.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_113.text: It won't take me until the end of time to find another like you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_210.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_210.text: Tonight, I shall drink every drop of your blood.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_24.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_24.text: Own your body, kill your mind.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_137.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_137.text: It will only hurt a bit, the pleasure will be far greater than the pain.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_137.context: CinematicNodeContext: He pushes you down to the ground, gets on top of you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion takes your hand, kisses the top of it, then turns it over and starts to bite your wrist.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_125.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion goes on fire after drinking Karlach's blood.NodeContext: Bit Karlach, got a mouthful of hot blood, caught fire

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_126.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_126.text: How dare you! How could you? I was trying to help you, but you're beyond help.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_126.context: NodeContext: Hubris here. He can't actually fix or hurt Karlach, but he's pretending he can.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_243.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_243.text: Get away from me - get out of my sight!

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_123.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_123.text: You have given me everything. Thank you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_100.speaker: Narrator
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_100.text: *As he drinks more and more, you feel yourself fading from consciousness. When you wake again, you will be his forever more.*
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion lowers his head to feast again.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_87.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_87.text: Oh, come on. Let it hurt.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion clutches your neck in his hand and grins, squeezing before biting you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_212.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_212.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player makes as if going to kneel and then knees him in the balls. (Note: What.The.Heck?)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_74.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_74.text: To hells with you, I'm done. I hope you rot.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note: Astarion straightens up from pained crouch, and storms off after saying this line)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_209.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leads Tav away to a secluded place. You both undress and Astarion pushes Tav to the bed. The sex is wild and animalistic. (Note: While the sex isn't super explicit, it's important to show suggestions of movements...such as thrusting, action/reactions of ecstasy, etc.)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_185.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leads Tav away to a secluded place. You both undress and Astarion pushes Tav to the bed. The sex is wild and animalistic. (Note: While the sex isn't super explicit, it's important to show suggestions of movements...such as thrusting, action/reactions of ecstasy, etc.)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion leads Tav away to a secluded place. You both undress and Astarion pushes Tav to the bed. The sex is wild and animalistic. (Note: While the sex isn't super explicit, it's important to show suggestions of movements...such as thrusting, action/reactions of ecstasy, etc.)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_40.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_40.text: I don't want this after all.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_104.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_104.text: It seems I misjudged you. I thought we might have a future together - even an eternity - but perhaps you're not worthy.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_81.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_81.text: So. What's it to be, darling? Is this it?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_180.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_180.text: I hope we can work things out and stay together.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_157.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_157.text: Of course we can. You're the one that I want - the one that I love.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_43.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_43.text: And you could be so much more, if you want it. One little bite and you could be mine forever.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_31.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_31.text: I still care for you, but it can't be like this.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_196.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_196.text: A pity, then. We could have had something truly special.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_162.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_162.text: I won't forget what you've done for me. I won't leave you to fight this alone.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_232.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_232.text: You came so far, only to slip now. Such a pity.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_67.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_67.text: You're a hypocrite, and I don't want to be with you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_153.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_153.text: There you are. The real you shows themselves at last.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_275.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_275.text: We are bound until the end, you and I. But there will be an end.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_11.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_11.text: Until then, you can enjoy my company. You can benefit from my power. But you will not be in my heart.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_198.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_198.text: I don't want to look at you again. Get out of my camp.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_133.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_133.text: Good luck with the brain, darling.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_122.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_122.text: Sounds like you'd have it all.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_261.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_261.text: I already have everything. Except you by my side.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_4.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_4.text: Are you ready to join me? To accept this immortal gift?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_164.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_164.text: No, this isn't what I want.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_173.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_173.text: What if I don't want forever?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_192.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_192.text: What's not to want? We could be together for all time.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_207.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_207.text: I wanted a good time, that's all.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_225.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_225.text: What do you mean? Think of the things I can offer you! You're not going to say no to that, surely?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_94.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_94.text: I wanted you to be free. It seems you never will be.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_36.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_36.text: But if you want the gift of eternity, I can give you that. One more bite is all it would take.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_53.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_53.text: Then stop joking around and let's sleep together.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_195.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_195.text: But don't you want more - don't you want eternity? One more bite is all it would take?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_5.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_5.text: I don't feel great about it, honestly.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_44.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_44.text: Well, what's done is done. And there's simply no point in dwelling on the past, is there?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_76.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_76.text: No, you have given me a glorious new future.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_35.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_35.text: I wanted a powerful ally. And now I have one.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_181.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_181.text: Indeed you do. I am so very, very powerful - all thanks to you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_63.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_63.text: I should probably start getting used to the shadows again. Who knows how long I have left in the sun?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_188.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_188.text: Don't say that - we could still find a way to control the tadpole.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_70.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_70.text: Maybe, but even if I could control it, it's a dangerous game.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_285.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_285.text: I'd spend every day waiting for something to go wrong. For the tadpole to find some new trick, reassert itself, and make me a slave again.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_145.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_145.text: You did the right thing, stopping the Black Mass.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_17.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_17.text: I know. That doesn't mean it stings any less.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_135.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_135.text: No, I made the right choice. Although I do regret the options I had.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_199.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_199.text: I'm surprised you didn't go through with the ritual. I was sure you were a power-hungry madman.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_10.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_10.text: I'm glad I still have the power to surprise you. Even if it's the only power I have left.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_282.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_282.text: Maybe never seeing the sun again is just the price of freedom.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_91.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_91.text: I'll be with you either way. I hope you know that.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_223.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_223.text: Assuming we survive, of course. Because a horrible death is always just around the corner with you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_220.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_220.text: And if it is? Can you live with that?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_33.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_33.text: I'll have to. But that doesn't mean I have to like it.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_73.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_73.text: There's... something I'd like to show you, if that's all right? Something out in the city.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_159.speaker: Narrator
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_159.text: *The graveyard is appropriately silent - there isn't a proverbial soul around.*
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of the graveyard to set the scene. (Question: Do we need to show actual graveyard, or just Astarion and Player emerging from bushes somewhere?)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_154.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion walks up to a gravestone covered in ivy and filth. It's old, cracked, and neglected. He reaches up and tears away the weeds. Underneath, we can see the inscription: 
|Astarion Ancunín: 229 - 268 DR| (Note: Needs old gravestone prop with his name. Possible to use ivy plant to cover prop? How tall is gravestone? Does Astarion need to squat/crouch down or bend over to interact with gravestone?)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_249.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_249.text: Nearly two hundred years and I never came back. Not since the night I woke up down there.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_132.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_132.text: I had to punch a hole in the coffin and claw my way through six feet of dirt.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_237.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_237.text: Then when I finally broke the surface, retching up dirt and congealed blood, Cazador was waiting.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_206.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_206.text: From that day on I was his. Until today.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_201.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_201.text: You were never his. Whatever he had, he took by force.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_187.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_187.text: Maybe, but he did take it. There's almost nothing left of the person I was. Just a name on a rock.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_119.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_119.text: How does it feel to be free?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_84.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_84.text: For nearly two centuries I stalked the streets like a ghost while the person I was lay here, dead and buried.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_191.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_191.text: Now I need to figure out who I am. What I want.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_155.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_155.text: You're the person I love. The person I want.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_241.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_241.text: You were by my side through all of this. Through bloodlust and pain and misery. You were patient. You cared. You trusted me when that was an objectively stupid thing to do.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_194.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_194.text: I feel safe with you. Seen. And whatever the future holds for me, I don't want to lose that.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_176.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_176.text: You won't. Whatever comes next, I've got you.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_47.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_47.text: Well. I should probably fix this.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking at the inscription on his grave

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_265.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion takes out Cazador's dagger and starts carving into the stone, although we can't see what he's carving. When he's done, the camera angle reverses and we see he's roughly cut a new inscription into the stone. Below his date of birth is a new date - the current year. The inscription now reads |Astarion Ancunín: 229 - 268 DR  468 DR -

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion sits back, looking at his gravestone, saying nothing. He's in a moment of deep reflection. (Note:Astarion is still kneeling down)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_230.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_230.text: Hold back. Give him his moment.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_114.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion stares at his grave, quietly contemplating his life/unlife (Note:Astarion is still kneeling down)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels next to Astarion (Note:Astarion is still kneeling down. Player starts with standing, then kneels down)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_178.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_178.text: I've been dead in the ground for long enough. It's time to try living again.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_179.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_179.text: With everything that life has to offer.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_179.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turning to the player, but doesn't touch player's handt. (Note: Both Astarion and Player are kneeling)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_0.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_0.text: I'd love to be closer to you, Astarion, but until my heart is fixed, it's too dangerous.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_221.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_221.text: And here I thought I was the dangerous one. But I'm not so frightening after all, am I?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_30.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_30.text: That's... interesting. I might even say I like it. And as for you and me, well, I'm willing to wait.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_147.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_147.text: What did you have in mind?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_102.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_102.text: A great deal. But nothing I can act on without burning to a crisp. But I'm willing to wait.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_83.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_83.text: With everything that life has to offer.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_83.context: CinematicNodeContext: Turning to the player, taking their hands in his for a moment. (Note: Both Astarion and Player are kneeling)NodeContext: Slightly horny. (ONLY SLIGHTLY, NEIL)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_287.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_287.text: If a night of passion is on offer, I could be persuaded.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_8.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_8.text: You know, I didn't care for you when we first met.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Note: Astarion releases Player's hands. They're still kneeling facing each other)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_75.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_75.text: But I do now. Being with you is about more than lust or manipulating you into a tactical alliance.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_56.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_56.text: I love you. I love this. And I want it all.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_216.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion kisses the player, taking them in his arms. They fall to the ground. Kissing continues.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_165.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fade to black. Sex sounds. (Note: Maybe camera pans up before fading to black with the dulcet symphony of sex)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_267.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_267.text: I think I need a little time, honestly.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_16.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_16.text: We don't have to rush into anything tonight.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: (Note: Astarion releases Player's hands. They're still kneeling facing each other)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_118.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_118.text: We might not have forever, but we do have all the time we need.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_15.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_15.text: Unless we die horribly tomorrow. Which is always a strong possibility.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_131.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_131.text: Come on, let's get back to the camp. Who knows how long before the others go feral without us there to guide them?
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_131.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note: Astarion gets to his feet from kneeling position, followed by Player

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_280.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_280.text: Come on, let's get back to the camp. If a night of passion isn't on the cards, a night of rest would be very, very welcome.
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_280.context: CinematicNodeContext: Note: Astarion gets to his feet, followed by Player

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_272.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_272.text: Oh? Do you want a little fun?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_226.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_226.text: I guess that depends on what your idea of 'a little fun' is.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_51.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_51.text: Of course. That... that would mean a lot.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and Astarion stand side by side before the grave.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_66.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_66.text: Pick up a flower and lay it on the grave.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_202.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player plucks a flower from the ground and lays it on Astarion's grave (Note: Needs flower prop. Astarion is still kneeling down)

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_276.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_276.text: That sounds very sincere. Are you sure the parasite hasn't chewed through your brain?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_172.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_172.text: If it has, it might be for the best.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_286.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_286.text: You're not out of the woods yet - we still have the parasites to deal with.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_144.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_144.text: Oh, I hadn't forgotten. But with you here, I am... dare I say 'optimistic' about our chances?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_90.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_90.text: The bastard got what was coming to him.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_266.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_266.text: It doesn't wipe away the stain he left on the world, though.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_227.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_227.text: A little stereotypical, don't you think?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_28.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_28.text: Perhaps, but some things are classics for a reason.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_128.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_128.text: Are we here to piss on someone's grave?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_78.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_78.text: The enthusiasm is appreciated, but hopefully not.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_253.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_253.text: You couldn't wait ten seconds before being an absolute freak?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_231.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_231.text: Something I haven't shown anyone else.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_79.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_79.text: If you want to sneak off for a cuddle, you can just ask.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_143.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_143.text: I'll try to restrain myself if you do. Shall we?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_138.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_138.text: That's it? You're giving up on walking in the sun?

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_182.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_182.text: Less giving up, more reassessing what I want. What I really want.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_110.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_110.text: I thought things would feel different when he was gone. That I'd be revelling in my freedom.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_98.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_98.text: Instead I just feel... blank? I suppose not wielding the blade myself makes a difference. It's all a little anti-climactic.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_26.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_26.text: Cazador took up so much room in my life - my memories of him, my need for revenge. Now there's just a blank space where he used to be.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_218.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_218.text: Maybe that's the space you need to build your own life.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_139.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_139.text: Assuming I have a life to build. It's a little hard to plan anything knowing there's still a tadpole burrowing its way through your brain.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_284.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_284.text: Defining yourself by the worst people in your life sounds kind of messed up.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_25.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_25.text: Perhaps. But it'd be worse again to pretend it never happened.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_117.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_117.text: Of course now that I'm free from one threat, we'll have to face the other: the tadpoles that let me walk in the light.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_96.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_96.text: Controlling them may still be an option, but it's a dangerous game.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_146.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_146.text: I'd live with the risk of something going wrong. Of the tadpole finding some new trick, reasserting itself, and making me a slave again.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_9.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_9.text: I'm not sorry I killed him.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_141.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_141.text: No, I don't expect you to be. You did what you thought was right. Even if you were objectively wrong.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_12.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_12.text: So why not focus on the tadpoles? They're our biggest problem.

SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_124.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BlackMassAftermath_124.text: The only reason I can still walk in the day, you mean? Yes, we will have to do something about them.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_4.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_4.text: I can still taste that vile drow in my throat.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_142.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_142.text: I don't know what I am.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_171.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_171.text: Throwing your body at someone becomes second nature. And I just did it again.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_39.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_39.text: I shouldn't have pushed you to bite her.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_18.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_18.text: It's all right. I didn't expect myself to feel anything.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_102.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_102.text: I forced myself to bite her.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_84.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_84.text: I'm so used to my body being used as a tool to get what someone else wants. But I'm free now. It shouldn't be like that.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_152.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_152.text: I'm sorry. I don't want you to do anything you don't want to do.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_35.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_35.text: I've seduced people who repulsed me more times than I can count.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_44.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_44.text: It should've just been another moment of disgust for greater reward.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_1.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_1.text: Huh. We shouldn't be involved with each other any more. I'll sleep alone.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_135.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_135.text: I only had our best interests at heart.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_61.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_61.text: You make your own choices now - for better or worse.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_75.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_75.text: I didn't expect it to bother you at all.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_67.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_67.text: I didn't think twice when the moment came, but now I can't get it off my mind.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_109.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_109.text: You can still throw your body at me, any time.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_51.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_51.text: I'm sure I can take your mind off her...

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_106.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_106.text: Really? After something like that, you think that's what I'm looking for?
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_106.context: NodeContext: Incredulous/hurt that you're looking for sex when he's trying to talk about something

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_5.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_5.text: I was just defiled by that creature, and you let it happen. You made it happen!

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_146.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_146.text: It was worth it for that potion.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_34.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_34.text: For what you said while I was in front of that vile drow.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_37.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_37.text: I spent two hundred years using my body to lure pretty things back for my Master. What I wanted, how I felt about what I was doing, it never mattered.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_56.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_56.text: You could have asked me to do the same - to throw myself at her, what I wanted be damned. But you didn't. And I'm grateful.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_155.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_155.text: I don't want you to do anything you don't want to do.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_187.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_187.text: It's a novel concept, I admit. And a little intimidating.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_27.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_27.text: It would have been so easy to bite her. To just go along with what I was being told to do.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_133.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_133.text: A moment of disgust to force myself through. And then I could have carried on, just like before.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_118.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_118.text: The entire reason for my existence was to seduce anything with a pulse.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_184.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_184.text: And every instinct I have tells me that nothing's changed. That I'm still just a means to an end.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_45.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_45.text: You made me see I never stopped thinking like I was still his slave, even in freedom.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_175.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_175.text: But I'm more than that. More than a thing to be used.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_132.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_132.text: Open your mind so he sees you care.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion and the player stare at each other, mindmelding. He understands the player speaks the truth.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_43.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player hugs Astarion, holding him for a long moment before breaking contact.

Tall player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_20.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_20.text: You... you are full of surprises, aren't you?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_108.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_108.text: Honestly, I have no idea what we're doing. Or what comes next.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_22.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion takes the players hands.

Tall player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_29.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_29.text: But I know that this? This is nice.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Facing the player, holding their handsNodeContext: 'This' referring to your relationship together

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_38.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_38.text: But I know that this? This is nice.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_38.context: CinematicNodeContext: NOT holding hands. Just enjoying being with Karlach (she can't touch).

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_42.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion takes the players hands.

Tall player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_88.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarion takes the players hands.

Short player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_74.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player hugs Astarion, holding him for a long moment before breaking contact.

Short player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_53.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_53.text: You are worth a great deal to me, no matter what you are going through.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_125.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_125.text: We can be together without sleeping together, for as long as you need.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_157.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_157.text: Hah! Why that almost sounds like a challenge.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_81.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_81.text: What do you want to do?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_143.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_143.text: I... don't know. It's been so long since I've had to decide what I wanted.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_167.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_167.text: Maybe what you really need is a friend, not a lover.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_48.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_48.text: I've held more people than I can count. An infinite parade of lovers.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_103.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_103.text: But a friend? I can't think of a single one.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_19.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Facing the player, holding their hands

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_163.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_163.text: It might be better if we don't see each other anymore.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_174.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_174.text: It's a shame, but I don't want to risk treating you like you were one of his victims.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_3.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_3.text: I slept with you because I wanted some fun, not to deal with this.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_127.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_127.text: Yes. I suppose there's not much point in me if I won't have sex. My only talent, I'm fully aware.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_57.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_57.text: Perhaps it's better if we don't continue with whatever this was. Perhaps we'll both be better for it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_52.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_52.text: How often were you disgusted by your targets?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_178.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_178.text: I tried to pick beautiful people where I could, but there were so many over the years. After a while you stop caring.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_49.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_49.text: Just repressed it and moved on? Sounds healthy.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_186.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_186.text: It's easy to judge a situation when you're not in it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_97.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_97.text: So why sleep with me? Did you think you'd get something from it?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_179.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_179.text: People don't trust vampires - perhaps understandably - so I needed to get someone on my side. And seducing you was easy, frankly.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_168.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_168.text: So imagine how stupid I felt when I started to genuinely feel something for you.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_6.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_6.text: Trust me, I was not happy about it. You were a complication I didn't see coming. And yet...

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_137.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_137.text: Are you getting sentimental on me?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_59.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_59.text: Oh, don't look at me like that. I'm as surprised as you are.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_185.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_185.text: It's just... it would have been so easy to bite her. To just go along with what I was being told to do.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_82.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_82.text: You make your own choices now - for better or worse.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_120.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_120.text: It's been so long since I've had to make these decisions for myself. I won't lie, it's a daunting prospect.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_173.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_173.text: I was hoping that as reward for my support you'd throw yourself at me.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_11.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_11.text: I- I'm not sure if I should.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_90.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_90.text: I don't think I want you to think of me in terms of sex.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_54.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_54.text: I don't know if I want anyone to.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_119.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_119.text: How do you want me to see you?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_145.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_145.text: As a person? Would that be so much to ask?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_153.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_153.text: Are you not attracted to me? Is that it?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_123.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_123.text: Of course I am - look at you!
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gesturing to the player's body.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_25.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_25.text: You're a vision. And you're so much more than that.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_9.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_9.text: ...I don't know what to think. I don't know what I want.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_65.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_65.text: I'm not like all the others, I promise.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_117.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_117.text: I suppose it has felt different with you...

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_176.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_176.text: I suppose... If this is what you want, then I shall provide.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_176.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Astarian steps toward the player and out of frame.

Fade to black, cut back into it the next morning.NodeContext: A little downbeat

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_71.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_71.text: Are you all right? What's wrong?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_68.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_68.text: If you have something to say, say it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_15.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_15.text: Don't tell me it was bad for you?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_16.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_16.text: This is all a game to you, isn't it?
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion shifts to look at the player, sad and confrontationalNodeContext: confrontational - but sad, and doesn't have the energy for an argument

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_104.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_104.text: No matter what I say, it doesn't matter. Not if you get what you want.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_104.context: NodeContext: confrontational - but sad, and doesn't have the energy for an argument

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_33.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_33.text: Of course not, it hurts to even hear you say that.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_105.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_105.text: Well, you got what you wanted. An apology doesn't mean much at this point.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_183.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_183.text: But you seemed like you were enjoying it last night?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_101.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_101.text: Of course I did, I know that dance better than anyone. But I always felt nothing.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_83.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_83.text: Not last night, though. Last night I felt miserable, and it was a revelation.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_188.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion stands, and looks down at the player

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_78.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_78.text: For as long as I can remember, I've been used by others. Controlled and puppeted for someone else's pleasure. But not anymore.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_140.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_140.text: Whatever we had - whatever this was - it's over.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_30.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_30.text: Why the Hells did you agree to sleep with me, then?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_62.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_62.text: I didn't know how to say no.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_158.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_158.text: You should learn to enjoy sex for your own pleasure, and you should enjoy it with me.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_177.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_177.text: Come, lie with me, you'll feel better about it then.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_112.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_112.text: I regret stopping you. That potion would've really helped.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_8.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_8.text: It's a game I'm tired of playing. Being used.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_148.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_148.text: I thought I could bear sleeping with you, to try and get you on my side.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_17.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_17.text: Now I couldn't stand to do it again.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_85.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_85.text: For being so wonderful in bed?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_149.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_149.text: Unfortunate, because you're going to hear it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_164.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_164.text: You stood up for me earlier, when that wretched drow was insisting I bite her. I appreciated it, that's all.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_93.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_93.text: Excuse me? This might be the first honest thing I've ever told you and you're 'not interested'?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_41.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_41.text: It seems I was wrong about you. About us.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_94.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_94.text: Do you have a moment? I think we need to talk.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_141.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_141.text: About your undying love for me?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_136.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_136.text: Something like that. Except... not that at all.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_69.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_69.text: Oh yes, I'm fine. I just-... feel awful.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_69.context: NodeContext: Reflexively brushes it away before dropping the mask

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_87.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_87.text: Look, I had a plan. A nice, simple plan - seduce you, sleep with you, manipulate your feelings so you'd never turn on me.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_124.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_124.text: It was easy - instinctive. Habits from two hundred years of charming people kicked in. All you had to do was fall for it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_113.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_113.text: And all I had to do was not fall for you... Which is where my nice, simple plan fell apart.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_23.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_23.text: You -... you're incredible. You deserve something real. I want us to be something real.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_147.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_147.text: So do I. More than anything.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_21.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_21.text: I just don't know what 'real' looks like. Not after two hundred years playing the rake.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_26.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_26.text: So the nights we spent together didn't mean anything?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_7.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_7.text: Of course they did - that's the problem! Or part of it.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_159.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_159.text: Being close to someone - any kind intimacy - was something I performed to lure people back for him.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_98.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_98.text: Even though I know things between us are different, being with someone still feels... tainted. Still brings up those feelings of disgust and loathing.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_128.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_128.text: I don't know how else to be with someone. No matter how much I'd like to.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_14.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_14.text: Were you even attracted to me? Or was it all a lie?

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_96.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_96.text: Of course I was attracted to you. Look at you, for goodness' sake!

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_165.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_165.text: I - yes, all right. I can understand.
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_165.context: NodeContext: A little surprised, then sadly accepting

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_160.speaker: Astarion
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_160.text: Oh it's nothing terrible, it's just-... well, maybe it is a little terrible.

SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_13.speaker: Player
SD_ROM_BloodMerchantAftermath_13.text: I'm not interested in hearing it.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_5.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_5.text: A quiet evening, for once. Perfect for two people who'd like to take some time to themselves, if you catch my meaning.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_14.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_14.text: And I do mean sex, to be clear. We've been waiting long enough.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_11.speaker: Player
Romance1_SD_Invitation_11.text: All right, but where will we go?

Romance1_SD_Invitation_12.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_12.text: Let's find our own little piece of nowhere. Somewhere we can lose ourselves and forget all this madness.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_13.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_13.text: There's a secluded place nearby that should do nicely. Wait until the others are asleep, then come and find me there.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_10.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_10.text: Indeed you will, my love. I can't wait.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_6.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_6.text: Excuse me? After everything you said before?

Romance1_SD_Invitation_0.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_0.text: All right, but it's very much your loss.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_1.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_1.text: Of course, only if you want to.

Romance1_SD_Invitation_7.speaker: Astarion
Romance1_SD_Invitation_7.text: But trust me - you do want to.
